definition: affected by involuntary jerky muscular contractions, a person suffering from spastic paralysis
details:
adjective
- affected by involuntary jerky muscular contractions
= synonyms: spasmodic
- suffering from spastic paralysis
= example: suffering from spastic paralysis
- relating to or characterized by spasm
= example: relating to or characterized by spasm
noun
- a person suffering from spastic paralysis
